thread.title: BRIEF-First Data Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.00

title: BRIEF-First Data Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.00
text:
February 12, 2018 / 12:11 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-First Data Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.00 Reuters Staff 
Feb 12 (Reuters) - First Data Corp: 
* FIRST DATA REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.00 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 7 PERCENT TO $3.15 BILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.44 
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.35 TO $1.40 * SEES 2018 FREE CASH FLOW ABOVE $1.4 BILLION * SEES FULL YEAR 2018 TOTAL SEGMENT REVENUE UP 5% TO 7% 
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.51 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.44 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
